|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

---

<details><summary>Decrease in tech debt: (relative, absolute) = (43.00, 0.01)</summary>

|Current number|Change|Type|
|-:|:-:|:-|
|4575|-43|porting notes|

Current commit [4f897cecff](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/4f897cecff425842a04c52dec1e3630f29b46f8f)
Reference commit [a4c5ecf11c](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/a4c5ecf11c62609afc9440d23079c3a952a22610)

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>
üöÄ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by grunweg.
I would like to review this properly before it lands
üöÄ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by YaelDillies.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12844976379/job/35818561725)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12844976379/job/35818561837)

Thanks for doing this! I have only four small questions.
maintainer delegate

Thanks!

maintainer merge
bors r+

Thanks for doing this! I have only four small questions.
maintainer delegate

Thanks!

maintainer merge
bors r+
Did you think about this/what's your opinion about this one?
Yes, it's needed, removing it causes at error at this declaration.
You're introducing a non-terminal simp now. To my naive mind, that's a regression.
Oh, I'm blind, I'll fix this one.
Can you benchmarking this file/check locally if this is an issue?
It was 688 heartbeats, now 882, so completely irrelevant.

For the record: the formatting in 20824 is slightly different, and you're removing these notes in that PR.

That said: I think this change is an improvement in any case.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore: cleanup many porting notes in Combinatorics
